answers.answer: I did at 30 weeks I measured 34 but measured back to normal two weeks later. So mine was his position at the time. 7 weeks is a lot tho. But I wouldn't worry till you know What's going on. Not good for you and the baby to stress.

At 19 weeks I was measuring at 26 weeks. I have only lost weight this pregnancy. My OB said that the measurement doesn't really mean a lot and that every one is different. My first two babies measured right on. I guess this time I have a different shape maybe...

question: hi ladies, I'm 25 weeks pregnant with my 4th child. I have been measuring within the normal range for fundal height this pregnancy. My last ob visit was when I was 18 weeks along, I had an ultrasound at 20 weeks and baby was measuring a week small but otherwise OK. However, I saw my midwife today and I'm measuring 7 weeks ahead all of a sudden. I haven't gained any weight. My cervix is way above my belly button! Anyways, ultrasound and gestational diabetes screening on Friday.. just wondering if anyone else has experienced this and what was the cause? Thanks in advance!!!
title: measuring large...
